00014 /*
00015  * Battery Stats collects and formats times series and summary data
00016  * from the Battery.
00017  *
00018  * BatteryStats' summary() and detail() methods are called by
00019  * Battery's finish() to format its table of device battery
00020  * consumption. (Methods shoud manage their own resources, since own
00021  * finish() may be done).
00022  *
00023  * For time series data it subscribes to BatteryState published by the
00024  * Battery.  Note: only BatteryStats should do this, all other modules
00025  * should use the Battery's estimateResidual() method (Battery Stats
00026  * does this as well, but for now estimate just follows redisual
00027  * capacity.)
00028  */
00029 #include "BatteryStats.h"
00030 #include <iostream>
00031 
00032 Define_Module(BatteryStats);
00033 
00034 void BatteryStats::initialize(int stage)
00035 {
00036   BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00037 
00038   if (stage==0) {
00039     doDetail = 0;
00040     doDetail = par("detail").boolValue();
00041     EV << "show details = " << doDetail << endl;
00042 
00043     doTimeSeries = 0;
00044     doTimeSeries = par("timeSeries").boolValue();
00045     EV << "show timeSeries = " << doTimeSeries << endl;
00046 
00047     if (doTimeSeries) {
00048       int scopeHost = (this->findHost())->getId();
00049       BatteryState bs;
00050       batteryCat = utility->subscribe(this, &bs, scopeHost);
00051 
00052       // suggest enabling only residualVec (omnetpp.ini), unless
00053       // others are of interest
00054 
00055       residualVec.setName("capacity(mW-s)");
00056       relativeVec.setName("capacity(relative)");
00057 
00058       cModule *batteryModule = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("battery");
00059       if (batteryModule) {
00060         battery = check_and_cast<SimpleBattery *>(batteryModule);
00061       }
00062       else {
00063         error("no battery module found, please check your Host.ned");
00064       }
00065       estimateVec.setName("estimate(mW-s)");
00066       estimateRelVec.setName("estimate(relative)");
00067     }
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void BatteryStats::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00072 {
00073   error("BatteryStats doesn't handle any messages");
00074 }
00075 
00076 // summary() and detail() are invoked by Battery's finish() method
00077 
00078 void BatteryStats::summary(double init, double final, simtime_t lifetime)
00079 {
00080   Enter_Method_Silent();
00081   recordScalar("nominal (mW-s)", init);
00082   recordScalar("total (mW-s)", init - final);
00083   recordScalar("lifetime(s) (-1 == non-failed)", lifetime);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void BatteryStats::detail(DeviceEntry *devices, int numDevices)
00087 {
00088   Enter_Method_Silent();
00089   if (!doDetail)
00090     return;
00091 
00092   recordScalar("num devices", numDevices);
00093 
00094   for (int i = 0; i < numDevices; i++){
00095     double total = 0;
00096     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts; j++) {
00097       total += devices[i].accts[j];
00098     }
00099     recordScalar(devices[i].name.c_str(), i);
00100     recordScalar("device total (mWs)", total);
00101     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts; j++) {
00102       recordScalar("account", j);
00103       recordScalar("energy (mWs)", devices[i].accts[j]);
00104       recordScalar("time (s)", devices[i].times[j]);
00105     }
00106   }
00107 }
00108 
00109 void BatteryStats::receiveBBItem(int category, const BBItem *details, int scopeModuleId)
00110 {
00111     Enter_Method_Silent();
00112     BaseModule::receiveBBItem(category, details, scopeModuleId);
00113 
00114     if (category == batteryCat) {
00115       double residualCapacity;
00116       double relativeCapacity;
00117 
00118       // battery time series never publishes capacity < 0, just 0
00119       residualCapacity = ((BatteryState *)details)->getAbs();
00120       residualVec.record(residualCapacity);
00121       relativeCapacity = ((BatteryState *)details)->getRel();
00122       relativeVec.record(relativeCapacity);
00123 
00124       // for comparison, also get the estimated residual capacity
00125       double estimate = battery->estimateResidualAbs();
00126       estimateVec.record(estimate);
00127 
00128       double estimateRel = battery->estimateResidualRelative();
00129       estimateRelVec.record(estimateRel);
00130     }
00131 
00132 }
00133 
00134 void BatteryStats::finish() {
00135 }
